about.title: CR Collective
about.intro: We are a collaborative architecture and visualization studio. We design and coordinate contemporary projects with BIM methodology to ensure coherence between concept, documentation, and execution. We operate as a work network with architects and civil engineers, integrating structure and MEP to deliver buildable, efficient solutions aligned with budget. Our approach: clear scope, orderly processes, and constant communication with the client.

about.mission.body: Create contemporary spaces that respond to real needs through transparent processes, constant communication, and informed decisions.
